mainText:
The world has lost a creative genius tonight that no one can ever  
replace. I was encouraged by my brother to switch from PC to Mac in  
2007. I'd hesitated for years thinking I'd never figure 'it' out even  
though my Art Director brother kept promising me Macs were user- 
friendly. My world opened up after I purchased my iMac. I'll never  
look back. I'll keep creating and honoring Mr. Jobs along the way, I  
hope.

Thank you Steve Jobs. You will be sorely missed.
author: Linda
